Appropriate complementary actions to meet the additional needs of pregnant and 
lactating women in emergencies ( 152) 
Fortified food commodities 2
Fortified blended food commodities are designed to provide 10%–12% (up to 15%) of energy 
from protein and 20%–25% energy from fat. The blended food must be fortified to meet two 
thirds of daily requirements for all micronutrients, particularly iron, folic acid and vitamin A. The 
food commodities can be provided through materna
